original_text: In the third year of Cyrus king of Persia, a revelation was given to Daniel (who was called Belteshazzar). Its message was true and it concerned a great war. The understanding of the message came to him in a vision.
korean_text: 바사 왕 고레스 제삼년에 한 일이 벨드사살이라 이름한 다니엘에게 나타났는데 그 일이 참되니 곧 큰 전쟁에 관한 것이라 다니엘이 그 일을 분명히 알았고 그 환상을 깨달으니라

sentences.original_text: In the third year of Cyrus king of Persia
sentences.korean_translation: 페르시아 왕 고레스 제 삼 년에

sentences.original_text: a revelation was given to Daniel
and it concerned a great war
came to him in a vision
